body: When an antipaladin reaches 4th level, he gains the supernatural ability to channel negative energy like a cleric. Using this ability consumes two uses of his touch of corruption ability. An antipaladin uses his level as his effective cleric level when channeling negative energy. This is a Charisma-based ability.
name: Channel Negative Energy
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Channel Negative Energy
